definition: ancient oasis town of Kroraina or Loulan on the Silk road near Lop Nor 羅布泊|罗布泊, modern Xinjiang
surname Lou
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: It was in ancient Loulan a strange bird.
sentences.chinese: 那是在楼兰古国的一种奇特的鸟。

sentences.english: Finally, we arrived in Loulan after several days of travelling.
sentences.chinese: 经过数日旅行，我们终于来到了楼兰。

sentences.english: This is the legend of the "Loulan Beauty" or "Rob Queen.
sentences.chinese: 这就是传说中的“楼兰公主”或“罗布女王”。

sentences.english: "We should do what only firemen can do, " said Lorenzo.
sentences.chinese: “我们应该做点只有消防员能做的事，”楼兰奏说。

sentences.english: Willing to lower the sword, straight to cut Kroraina.
sentences.chinese: 愿将腰下剑，直为斩楼兰。

sentences.english: Next week we are flying to China, and going to Loulan, which is known as China's Pompeii in the desert.
sentences.chinese: 下周我们将飞去中国，去楼兰这个中国沙漠中的庞贝。

sentences.english: Ned and Lorenzo ran very fast.
sentences.chinese: 耐德和楼兰奏跑得很快。

sentences.english: Whether it is ancient Loulan have disappeared, or the disintegration of the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 无论是已经消失的楼兰古国，还是解体的苏联。

sentences.english: And then fire back to the ancient Loulan, in the Tianyi mountain ashes.
sentences.chinese: 然后把火种带回楼兰古国，在天翼山化为灰烬。

definition: ancient people of central Asia during the Han dynasty
Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
ancient Central Asian city state, flourished in first millennium AD, in modern Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang
Shule ancient name for modern Kashgar/Shule county in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang
Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
ruins of Heishui Town of Xixia 西夏[Xi1 Xia4] people, in Ejin Banner 額濟納旗|额济纳旗[E2 ji4 na4 Qi2], Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia
Dunhuang county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
the Greater Yuezhi, a branch of the Yuezhi 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] people of central Asia during the Han dynasty
Yanqi county in Xinjiang
Piqan county or Pichan nahiyisi in Turpan prefecture 吐魯番地區|吐鲁番地区[Tu3 lu3 fan1 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
desert
ancient state of central Asia
Bügür nahiyisi or Luntai county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Tianshan mountain range between XinJiang and Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
